A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It depends which way you want the series to go.  I can see both sides of this movie.  It seems like Disney is certainly producing what they want.  Yes Star Wars is about family\, but this seemed like a watered down try at Empire.  It's good in spots\, but not good enough.  Yoda and Luke\, Rey and Luke showing a different aspect to the force was good but show in battle scenes.  So we can get a true sense of what these new powers have to offer.  Unfortunately a big disappointment but doesn't stop me Fromm enjoying the franchise. It does slow it down.  Marvel rules the galaxy at this point.
